title: Deliver Her from Evil
description: Life as US Marshall Casey Spencer knows it is over after a gunshot wound renders his leg nearly useless. Barred from the field work he loves, he has no close friends, no family, no hometown, and no desire to settle for life behind a desk.Then he spies a beautiful girl being stalked by menacing men in a mall food court. Drawn into the mystery, upon helping her Casey learns that she is Deanna Hughes who is trying to get away and find herself again after being brainwashed by a large religious cult. But powerful forces will not rest until they get revenge, and Casey and Deanna will face many more trials before they can bury their dark pasts and embark on a new life together.
author: Andie Dubois
